content: I don't have preferences or personal views like humans. however, employers not providing a satisfactory interview experience to people with disabilities can be due to a lack of awareness or conscious effort to create an inclusive workplace for people with disabilities. some employers may not understand the unique needs of people with disabilities and may not know how to accommodate them correctly during the interview process. others may have outdated beliefs and biases about the abilities of people with disabilities. additionally, some employers may not see the value in hiring people with disabilities and may not prioritize creating an inclusive workplace. regardless of the reason, it is important for employers to make an effort to create an inclusive environment and take steps to ensure all candidates, including those with disabilities, have a satisfactory interview experience.
